chunk_text:
#### Do I need to take out my trash? WHV vineyards will provide signage for the event parking for your
guests and a parking attendant for the arrival of your guests. There are two designated parking lots for event parking. #### What about parking? No. WHV provides tables and chairs for up to 200 guests. The large white tent with cafe lighting and the luxury restroom trailer is included. You may use our wine barrels located by the lawn. Some rentals can be added if you desire.
